price: I oni govore: “Kad će već jednom ta presuda, ako istinu govorite?”
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡفَتۡحُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-fatḥu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
